translation: And I am Prahlada among the demons, I am Time among reckoners, I am the lion among beasts, and Vainateya (Garuda) among birds.
commentary: 10.30 Prahlada Prahlada? f and? I am (I) am? among the demons of the demons? Time: time? Calculate among reckoners? I'm I? of deer among beasts? f and? The deer is a lion? I'm I? Vainateya son of Vinata (Garuda)? f and? birds among birds.Commentary Prahlada? though he was the son of a demon (Hiranyakasipu)? was a great devotee of the Lord.
